name: 陳勇成
objective:
在「物」的紛繁世界中，可移動的「器物」，是人類文化、儀式、工藝的綜合表現。可以說，物質（器物）和精神（習慣）相互形成，又相互決定。
器物如何為人類所用？人與器物之間關係如何變遷消長，是探討人類文化的一項重要課題。
Among the various "objects" in the world, movable "utensils" are a comprehensive expression of human culture, rituals, and crafts. It can be said that material (utensils) and spirit (customs) form and determine each other. How utensils are used by humans and how the relationship between humans and utensils changes are important topics for exploring human culture.
